name: Slither Solo: Classic Snake
description:
Develop your slither io skills ! Can you become the biggest snake ?

Eat the food to grow up, or kill the other snakes.
Don't let your head touches another worm.

Main features:

- Realtime worldwide rank : you rank is updated in real time, all over the world.
- No lag or performances issues. Works on every mobile device.
- Smooth joystick controls
- Unlock many skins
- Try to beat your highest score
- Challenge your friends with the in-game leaderboard
- Internet connection is not needed ( offline or online game )
- Balance gameplay, better than agar io : small snake can beat big snake !
- Internet connection is not needed, play wherever, you are offline or online

How long can you survive ?
